headline: Polen Global Growth Portfolio Q2 2025 Commentary
summary: During the quarter, Polen Global Growth Portfolio returned 8.16% gross of fees (7.87% net of fees) compared to 11.53% for the Index. Read more here.

headline: Oakmark Bond Fund Q2 2025 Commentary
summary: Oakmark Bond Fund (Institutional Share Class) outperformed the benchmark, the Bloomberg U.S. Aggregate Index, for the quarter and since inception. Read more here.
